resources.string: Figures that represent the human being, whole body, head, hands and feet prints, image abstraction
Animal figures with their own features\n recreating nature with a specific purpose.
Representation with graphic elements like\n dots, lines, circles, or images more\n abstract, formed with the same elements.
Anthropomorphic figures, combined with\nZoomorphic parts generate\nAnthropozoomorphic representations
Anthropomorphic figures combined with\nGeometric parts or components generate\nAnthropogeometric representations
Zoomorphic figures combined with\nAnthropomorphic components generate\nZooanthropomorphic representations
Zoomorphic figures combined with\nGeometric components generate\nZoogeometric representations
Geometric figures combined with\nAnthropomorphic components generate\nGeoanthropomorphic representations
Geometric figures combined with\nZoomorphic components generate\nGeozoomorphic representations

Zoomorphic and Geometric components generate
